name: GKMeshGraphTriangulationMode
desc: Options for how to place graph nodes when generating the graph, used by the triangulationMode property.

items.name: static var vertices: GKMeshGraphTriangulationMode
items.desc: An option to place graph nodes at each vertex in the generated mesh.

items.name: static var centers: GKMeshGraphTriangulationMode
items.desc: An option to place graph nodes at the center of each polygon in the generated mesh.

items.name: static var edgeMidpoints: GKMeshGraphTriangulationMode
items.desc: An option to place graph nodes at the midpoint of each in the generated mesh.
